name: groman
text: A comment left by groman was marked as spam and excluded. groman: What a douche. (reported by hellofyellin, mortshire, m1st3rbl4ck)

name: cicadalek
text: I like to think he carried it round the corner but drove it on the straights, 'cos he does what he's told.

name: bpmead
text: I like to think he's still walking the van in a straight line to this day.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Nowadays I don't think anyone would even slightly care what Todd does once he's left the house.

name: evolume
text: later, he forgets to turn off his signal.

name: radishes
text: I love kthor and I love this strip.

name: snowman
text: It's creepy how everyone's just sorta standing around, silent and straight-faced.

name: mrfedora
text: I know a Thor Jensen. I wonder....

name: tekende
text: Now this one I really like.

name: delicatemoth
text: I like this much more than the previous guest strip. I love the way it doesn't occur to any of them that they could just carry Todd home, or leave him to sleep it off.

name: landowmpg
text: I like this one too, but I get a nails-on-chalkboard feeling when I see Philippe's name misspelled in an actual strip.  As if it didn't get mutated enough on these boards.

name: tripleg
text: that blinker had me laughing a good five minutes.

name: puguglypress
text: This is what it feels like when you're a kid and an adult gives you a task that they didn't really think through.
